#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
/*int gcd(int a,int b)
{//int x=a,y=b;
while(a!=b)
 {if(a>b)
  a=a-b;
  else
  b=b-a;
 }
 return a;
}*/
int gcd(int a,int b)
{if(b==0)
 return a;
 return gcd(b,a%b);
}
int main()
{int t,a,b,c,d,x,y,temp;
 int m,n,g;
 cin>>t;
 while(t--)
 {cin>>a>>b>>c>>d;
  x=c-a;
  y=d-b;
  x=abs(x);
  y=abs(y);
  g=gcd(x,y);
  m=x/g;
  n=y/g;
  if(x==0||y==0)
  cout<<0<<endl;
  else if(x==y) 
  cout<<x<<endl;
  else
  cout<<(m+n-1)*g<<endl;
 }
}
